titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 20) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2007, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-6, by Ms. Slaughter.

Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 20 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 6.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 116.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 192 (Roll no. 66).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 191 (Roll no. 67).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/30/2007--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.J. Res. 20 (FY2007 continuing appropriations).
